1. barcode item -> product
	1) barcode item 테이블에서 products테이블에 없는 원자재 데이터 가져오기  
	* insert into products(id, domain_id, name, description, prod_type, unit, default_qty, short_name, model_no, cust_code, cust_part_no, cust_part_name, creator_id, updater_id, created_at, updated_at)
	select concat('System-' , item_cd), 'System', item_cd, item_nm, 'RM', unit, box_qty, item_tp, model_no, customer_cd, cust_item_cd, cust_item_nm, 'admin', 'admin', sysdate, sysdate from barcode.item where item_cd not in (select name from products) and use_yn = '1' and acct_fg = 0
	
	2) barcode item 테이블에서 products테이블에 없는 완제품 데이터 가져오기  
	* insert into products(id, domain_id, name, description, prod_type, unit, default_qty, short_name, model_no, cust_code, cust_part_no, cust_part_name, creator_id, updater_id, created_at, updated_at)
	select concat('System-' , item_cd), 'System', item_cd, item_nm, 'FERT', unit, pallet_qty, item_tp, model_no, customer_cd, cust_item_cd, cust_item_nm, 'admin', 'admin', sysdate, sysdate from barcode.item where item_cd not in (select name from products) and use_yn = '1' and acct_fg = 2
	
	3) barcode item 테이블에서 products테이블에 없는 반제품 데이터 가져오기  
	* insert into products(id, domain_id, name, description, prod_type, unit, default_qty, short_name, model_no, cust_code, cust_part_no, cust_part_name, creator_id, updater_id, created_at, updated_at)
	select concat('System-' , item_cd), 'System', item_cd, item_nm, 'HALB', unit, box_qty, item_tp, model_no, customer_cd, cust_item_cd, cust_item_nm, 'admin', 'admin', sysdate, sysdate from barcode.item where item_cd not in (select name from products) and use_yn = '1' and acct_fg = 4
